name: AutoML
description: This script executes, in the correct order, all the steps from the BigML's Automated Machine Learning pipeline

inputs.name: automl-execution
inputs.description: Previous execution of this script, to reuse created resources, e.g. execution/5d272205eba31d61920005cd

inputs.name: excluded-fields
inputs.description: List of field names to be excluded from all the datasets. Empty by default

inputs.name: excluded-models
inputs.description: List of unsupervised models that won't be created nor reused during feature generation, e.g. ['association', 'pca']. Empty by default

inputs.name: pca-variance-threshold
inputs.description: The PCA projection uses the minimum number of components such that the cumulative explained variance is greater than the given threshold. Values from 0 to 1. All the components will be used by default

outputs.name: output-dataset
outputs.description: Output test dataset with predictions from the fusion

outputs.name: output-evaluation
outputs.description: Evaluation of the fusion model with the validation dataset

outputs.name: unsupervised-models
outputs.description: List of unsupervised models created from train-dataset
